title: List of all Android blockchain  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android blockchain  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: token-core-android
repoList.description: a blockchain private key management library on android

repoList.name: web3j
repoList.description: Lightweight Java and Android library for integration with Ethereum clients

repoList.name: iroha-android
repoList.description: Android library for Iroha, a Distributed Ledger Technology (blockchain) platform.

repoList.name: unused-My-Wallet-V3-jar
repoList.description: Deprecated. Now lives here: https://github.com/blockchain/My-Wallet-V3-Android/tree/master/wallet

repoList.name: bitcoin-kit-android
repoList.description: Full Bitcoin library for Android, implemented on Kotlin. Complete SPV wallet implementation for Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash and Dash blockchains.

repoList.name: eos-kit-android
repoList.description: General purpose Android library (SDK) for the EOS blockchain and EOSIO protocol, written on Kotlin

repoList.name: ark-kotlin
repoList.description: Library for interacting with an Ark Ecosystem Blockchain using the JVM. Written in Kotlin and fully interoperable with Java & Android.

repoList.name: stellar-java-mnemonic
repoList.description: A Java library that can be used to create mnemonics for the Stellar Network (e.g. for your Android app)

repoList.name: BlockChainApplication
repoList.description: Connect Android App to Ethereum Testnet Using web3j library

repoList.name: AndroidBlockchain
repoList.description: Implementation of a base Blockchain Library in Android (Kotlin)
